name: 簡永彬
objective:
從回顧己發展 180 多年攝影術的藝術歷程，啟笛學子去體悟、不同的年代攝影思潮的轉換及美學價值；並進的實務操練與當代數位科技的應用結合，帶領學子更務實去瞭解及面對，當代攝影美學在後數位時代洪流中，可能的發展面相。
From the development of 180 years of photography has been the development of the artistic process, Leading students to understand the different era of photographic changes and aesthetic value; and practical practice and the application of contemporary digital technology combined to lead the students more pragmatic to understand and face , Contemporary photographic aesthetics in the post-era era of torrent, the possible development of the facade.
